DOC.brief_summary: Pre- and postoperative cardiopulmonary rehabilitation reduces complications after coronary artery bypass surgery. This study was conducted as a randomized trial to verify this hypothesis in our institution. ICSC
DOC.brief_title: Pre- and Postoperative Cardiopulmonary Rehabilitation Reduces Complications After Coronary Artery Bypass Surgery: A Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: All CAB patients SCA in the previous 24h and incapacity of doing light exercise. Valvular patients
